title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When using the 'Import Project' feature, there is no default folder preselected. The software doesn't remember the last folder used for importing a project.
EB: It would be nice if the 'Import Project' feature could automatically preselect the last folder I've imported a project from. This would improve user experience and save time when importing multiple projects from the same location.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software.
2. Go to the 'Import/Export' section.
3. Select 'Import Project'.
4. Observe that there is no default folder preselected.
